name: Rage Against Dying of the Light
name_original: Rage Against Dying of the Light
description:
This is the game I made as a project for my engineering degree. The game is complete in its current state, yet I would like to continue working on it (consider it a alpha version).

I designed and programmed it myself. Artwork used in game was made by 2 of my friends (Piotr Adamczewski and Karol Janicki) and me.

I would also like to credit Piotr Adamczewski and Szymon Gabrowski for playtesting and giving feedback.

Enjoy!
